website_summaries.verdict: If you want to get a little color, but still protect your skin from the sun, Banana Boat is a quality choice.
pros: The mist sprays on evenly and  we found it easy to cover the entire body
Banana Boat doesn't leave a sticky, oily feeling either
cons: Product runs out quicker than we would have liked

customer_reviews.title: The best sunsreen/sunscreen sprays are by Banana Boat.
customer_reviews.text: The best sunsreen/sunscreen sprays are by Banana Boat. Even my husband loves it and he hates the feeling of anything on his skin! Their dry-oil formula is non-greasy and great smelling. Since I've put him on it he's never once burned and we do spend a lot of time in the sun! Not all dry-oils are created equal; this one is one of the only ones (I've noticed) that doesn't pick up dirt or dust when you spray it on your feet and wear flip flops...
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This dry oil sunscreen is fantastic. The spray applies the sunscreen evenly and at all angles. It dries within seconds of spraying it on and has a pleasant scent. The twist lock makes it easy to pack and travel without worrying about accidental usage. My only complaint is regarding the expiration date. Sunscreen generally has a 3 year shelf life from the manufactured date, but these arrived with only 6 months before the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: The is the only thing I use. I’m fair skinned and burn easily. I spray this on and can spend the day in the boat and never burn. My skin get tanned and not burned
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Honestly my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Some people are obsessed with the highest SPF they can get but never reapply: those people are wrong on so many levels. This sunscreen is so lovely to put on, especially since I have dry skin that reacts well to dry oil. It's also easy to reapply through the day no matter how sweaty I've gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Sabino

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Shipped out fast I had to actually use this item over the summer. I got very tan using all three cans definitely recommend for a nice tan.
customer_reviews.author: dennis whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Love this and can't find it anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I love using tanning oil and getting a nice healthy tan, but I actually want a decent SPF! I've only found the 15SPF in a couple stores and never knew there was a 25 until I looked on amazon, the price is pretty good, about the same as I would pay in Walgreens for the 15. I love the spray because it goes on quickly, evenly and smells great. I usually spray a little bug spray on top because the bees seem to also be attracted to this sunscreen. Definitely helps me tan and I will continue to recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lmk

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I use this dry spray every day on my neck to protect skin when exercising outside. So light I can’t feel it at all. Doesn’t sweat off
customer_reviews.author: Super1

customer_reviews.title: Great turn around.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for years and I’m glad I was able to find it thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: what an invention, protects with no scent and no oily feeling. just a great product
customer_reviews.author: Ricky W

customer_reviews.title: solid sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This brand is my goto sunscreen. I buy the 4, 8, and 15 for whenever I am on a tropical vacation. The smell is pleasant, the sunscreen goes on evenly, and it does not feel overly oily. The only lighter sunscreen I've ever used is the neutragena ultra sheer but they don't make that under 50 any more, so banana boat it is.
customer_reviews.author: marek twarog

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Gentle on sensitive skin, and very effective. Survives body surfing nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: seabreezecats

customer_reviews.title: Argan Oil????
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order. Why does it say with "Argan oil" on the front instead of "Coconut oil?" I bought this because of the coconut oil. I know that some people have bad reactions to Argan oil, and this concerns me. For now, I am only giving it 1 star because of my uncertainty.
customer_reviews.author: Wade DeVore

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful light dry oil
customer_reviews.text: Nice, light dry oil, but not too dry.Smells wonderful too. I wish they made it in higher SPFs though, like 15 and 30.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rupprecht

customer_reviews.title: solid sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This brand is my goto sunscreen. I buy the 4, 8, and 15 for whenever I am on a tropical vacation. The smell is pleasant, the sunscreen goes on evenly, and it does not feel overly oily. The only lighter sunscreen I've ever used is the neutragena ultra sheer but they don't make that under 50 any more, so banana boat it is.
customer_reviews.author: marek twarog

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Non greasy. Can’t even tell it’s on
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product feels and smells. It’s easy to spray on AND spread around. It doesn’t leave a filmy, squeaky feeling like the “sport” brands do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 pack of spf8 adult sun screen
customer_reviews.text: Pack of 3 spf 8 spray sun tan spray. Smells like a coconut smell almost.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: Nice tan, no greasy hands, good spf
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff, protects you but even gives those with fair skin a good tan. Only problem is the spray [which makes it great as you can avoid greasy feel in application and on hands] but for traveling thourgh airports must be in checked luggage or they will take it away from you.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Seton OBrien

customer_reviews.title: solid sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This brand is my goto sunscreen. I buy the 4, 8, and 15 for whenever I am on a tropical vacation. The smell is pleasant, the sunscreen goes on evenly, and it does not feel overly oily. The only lighter sunscreen I've ever used is the neutragena ultra sheer but they don't make that under 50 any more, so banana boat it is.
customer_reviews.author: marek twarog

customer_reviews.title: Aerosol is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Spray block is the only way to go. You don't have to rub it in and you can put it over your entire body by your self. No more awkward rubbing down a neighbor at the beach. This is all I buy now.
customer_reviews.author: karisa bronson

customer_reviews.title: a great change of pace
customer_reviews.text: so tired of all the oily sunscreens. we have been using 15 of this and another brand 30 but the 30 was way too oily. a great change of pace.
customer_reviews.author: dcat27

customer_reviews.title: Aerosol is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Spray block is the only way to go. You don't have to rub it in and you can put it over your entire body by your self. No more awkward rubbing down a neighbor at the beach. This is all I buy now.
customer_reviews.author: karisa bronson

customer_reviews.title: Florida Native and It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Sprays on great. No greasy feel at all. Does the job, I use it to tan and get sun protection when I'm out for a long period of time
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite sunscreen/tanning lotion. It gives you an instant bronze when you put it on and works well to amplify your tan while still providing some protection.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kopocs

customer_reviews.title: I'll never stop buying
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing I can use to get a very fast tan! Not oily or sticky! Beautiful, quick tan!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Vici

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Each year I order this product to take on our vacation to St. Maarten. 3 will last (for the 2 adults) the entire 7 day stay. Easy to use and protection is great - we use 8Spf.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Spray mechanism does not work
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the 3 cans I received does not spray.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked significantly and I will return to do business again with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: FrankfromtheChi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen! Moisturizes but not to oily. The only suncscreen my daughter can use, as she breaks out from others.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi S.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time and in 2 days with prime. We live on the beach and go through a lot of oil. Good price.Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Toole

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC SELLER. GREAT PRODUCT AND I'M VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC SELLER. GREAT PRODUCT AND I'M VERY PLEASED. THANKS MUCH. 5 STAR SELLER. Rene
customer_reviews.author: Renny LOVE singer  PATTI PAGE & AUDREY HEPBURN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen sprays on and protects you from the sun. What a time to be alive!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: POOR  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: STAINS SWIM SUITS, AND CLOTHES, STAINS WILL NOT COME OUT. WROTE TO BANANA BOAT WILL NOT RETURN E-MAIL NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother if you plan on applying it to yourself
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother if you don't have someone who can spray it for you. I've always used the lotion and can get all areas including my shoulder blades. The spray isn't as easy and i can't get my lower shoulder blades
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Mohler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff. It goes on nice, stops me from burning, smells alright, feels amazing, applies easy... what more can you ask for?! It does go fairly quick- doing all over application I get probably +/-8 applications out of a bottle, but realistically I think that's completely fair for the price and the application method. You get more bang for your buck in lotions, but they're a pain to apply, so it is what it is. I tend to use self-tanner, but if I will be in the sun you won't catch me without this stuff on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection while tanning
customer_reviews.text: SPF 25 spray is not sticky or too greasy, it protects from the sun while allowing me to tan. I love all the Banana Boat Dry Oil range and have them in every SPF. This SPF 25 is great for shoulders, neck, knees, feet and areas that are prone to burning and really stops me getting sunburned.
customer_reviews.author: Pillowtalk

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for self-application
customer_reviews.text: After a recent sunburn, I decided to start being more vigilant with sunblock. The Banana Boat spray is excellent because I can be alone and still apply it to hard to reach places like the center of my back. It works as you'd expect -- no surprises good or bad, and that's what I really want from sunblock. I ordered a 3-pack to have around the house because the price point and quality are a solid blend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Tabor

customer_reviews.title: No smell... No annoying residue
customer_reviews.text: Ever use traditional sunscreen and get that sticky residue that attracts dirt and dust to your skin? Felt "grungy" from the leftover sunscreen in your hair? Walked around smelling like sunscreen for the rest of the day? Had that sunscreen smell in your clothes that never washes out? You WON"T have these problems with the Dry Oil sunscreen. Being oil-based, it dissipates/absorbs into your skin and doesn't leave that annoying residue behind. There are no chemical odors and no girly perfumes. I didn't get burnt, so it was effective too.
customer_reviews.author: p0

customer_reviews.title: Always works great to help me get a little color
customer_reviews.text: Always works great to help me get a little color. Be careful not to rely only on it for hours on end-it doesn't have that much sun protection but that's it's point which is to let some in and get you tan and it works and goes on easily-unlike other sprays this one doesn't feel greasy and I haven't had any running into the eyes stinging problems either
customer_reviews.author: Nico B

customer_reviews.title: Non-oily.....oil....a nice alternative
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. A non-greasy oil with good sun protection. It seems the cam does not last long which detracts from the value for me. I wish the same was available in a lotion.
customer_reviews.author: NJSCH59

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product and works great! Shipping took over 3 weeks was my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Easy to apply and provides great protection from sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sunscreen! It sprays well and doesn't weirdly ball up on my skin after a shower like another brand I used to use! I happened upon this and won't go back!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions and you will not be disappointed! My kids and I have been using this product for years now.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Martha

customer_reviews.title: Dry not greasy smells great
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this product and very glad she could find it here. So far what she has used is great for her
customer_reviews.author: George Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic, no oily residue
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it daily to protect my skin. It smells fantastic. It's not oily. Remember to reapply if you're in direct sunlight for extended periods of time (standard advice for any sunscreen). Will definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! I've used this before and wanted more for my indoor tan bed and for my future cruise vaca coming up. I always get a golden brown color within the first few hours of using this, and it smells nice to!
customer_reviews.author: Retro

customer_reviews.title: Banana Boat Rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm from Florida and have tried every sunscreen there is, I think. I love Banana Boat Sunscreen. It sprays a fine cool mist, never oily! Nice seller too. Got a defective can that's spray sputtered and top leaked. Seller refunded my money right away no questions asked. That's trust......that's Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love dry spray. Convenient, no mess and worth a little extra (depending on what you usually use.....I'm a cheapskate!)
customer_reviews.author: Dilli

customer_reviews.title: Love It. Smells amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Never buying non-aerosol sunscreen again. This is perfect for people who don't burn super easily and want to get darker while being protected. I'm a white guy and this is enough protection so long as you reapply every couple hours AND have a decent base tan to start the summer. Plus it smells awesome
customer_reviews.author: William Elliott

customer_reviews.title: awesome tanner with just enough spf
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite sunscreen/tanner. Goes on great, not sticky or runny. Just enough spf I tan not burn. Can't say much on price compared to stores, never seen it in a store before. Think this will be pool party favorite
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No burns for this guy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite sunblocks, just enough spf not to get burned and I get a great tan from it.
customer_reviews.author: leftysav

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tanning spray
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tanning spray - so much so that I have to buy it in bulk. I with they would make bigger sizes. Its never stained my clothes and the light mist is not oily like other brands
customer_reviews.author: chad g.

customer_reviews.title: Best Protection & Color
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to get some color but also some protection, there's nothing better. I've been using this since I lived in Phoenix and I will continue ordering it now that I live in Texas and they don't sell it in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Tim | The Jetsetting Jock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes on dry and without the greasy feel, and works great--even after going into the water.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes on dry and without the greasy feel, and works great--even after going into the water.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: so easy and works well
customer_reviews.text: My Husband smiles as I finally use sunscreen. so easy and works well. It does not feel greasy
customer_reviews.author: nadams

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen.  It works and it smells great.
customer_reviews.text: Favorite sunscreen. It works and it smells great. Makes you tan faster than the high SPF stuff.
customer_reviews.author: William Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes on dry and without the greasy feel, and works great--even after going into the water.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: loved
customer_reviews.text: the best tanning oil ever !!!!!!!!!! does not make you red, just tanned...the only problem is that last not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Vicentin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Same as you get in any convenience store, and so much cheaper. I like how it doesn't leave you feeling icky and oily. Feels like normal spray sunscreen, with the perk of helping you get a nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: tay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this tanning oil. The spray works very well and coats evenly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nevitt

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Same as you get in any convenience store, and so much cheaper. I like how it doesn't leave you feeling icky and oily. Feels like normal spray sunscreen, with the perk of helping you get a nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: tay

customer_reviews.title: happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this tanning oil. She refuses to use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Tan in the Sand
customer_reviews.text: Great tanning product, especially when you are tanning in the sand it does not allow the sand to stick to you like other oils...
customer_reviews.author: Simple

customer_reviews.title: Never feel like I have dry skin after using this product like ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years and works as advertised. Keeps your skin from peeling (as long as you don't get burnt of course). Also protects you at a low level from the sun and bronzes your skin. Never feel like I have dry skin after using this product like others out there.
customer_reviews.author: mburrows

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: The product was poorly packaged so, some of the sprays were damaged and even one was broken. Additionally, the don’t come with the proper security plastic seal as all banana boat products do.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P. Lema

customer_reviews.title: Sun time Funtime
customer_reviews.text: I have always love banana boat for quite awhile. And getting this from Amazon my first time was a great in price wise I think I got a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kennith Gantz

customer_reviews.title: Great Tanning Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tanning product. Use to be for years a Coppertone girl - but once you try this product you will change over as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleen

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day all year. I use it as my after shower lotion and my suntan oil in the summer and just my shower spray the rest of the year . I love the fact that it's an oil but a dry one so it's not slimey. I can't find SPF4 anywhere else but Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: NANA R

customer_reviews.title: Bannana Boat 25 SPF tanning spray
customer_reviews.text: This product came quick and it was offered at a good price. I haven't yet tried it but a tanner with a good SPF is important for me. I would recommend this product to others. I have used this banana boat in the past only it was an SPF 14. Good product!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Harvey

customer_reviews.title: not good at
customer_reviews.text: It does noting, but help to burns you, not good at all
customer_reviews.author: Charles Alaimo

product_meta.title: Banana Boat Protective Dry Oil Reef Friendly Sunscreen Spray with Coconut Oil, Broad Spectrum SPF 25, 6 Ounces - Pack of 3
product_meta.description: Size:6 Ounce (Pack of 3)| Style:SPF 25Experience the islands even in your own backyard. This sheer, non-greasy formula made with coconut and grape seed oils provides fast and even coverage that can be applied at any angle—even upside down!
feature_bullets: REEF SAFE Sunscreen, made without oxybenzone and octinoxate
Broad Spectrum UVA and UVB Protection
Twist n Lock Spray, No Cap!
